text: @JoyAnnReid @kasie Exactly!  Thank you for calling out Nancy Pelosi and the house democrats for trying to get publicly funded abortion money included in a Coronavirus bill. It’s just sick politics and I hope you will continue to call it out. Unfortunately I bet you will go silent on this!
